title: a chunk of Brian Evenson's most excellent story Windeye
author: Jaybizz

comments.content:
If you are asking us to identify the typeface, it's Verlag by Hoefler & Co.

[http://www.typography.com/fonts/verlag/overview/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180629/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/verlag/overview/ "http://www.typography.com/fonts/verlag/overview/")
Thank you so much! It's a beauty!
